body_html:
The implementation in https://github.com/farizrahman4u/keras-contrib is not exactly right.
According to the paper, the IN layer should perform differently in training/testing phase.
There needs a running_mean and a running_var.
The right Torch implementation for reference is here:
https://github.com/junyanz/CycleGAN/blob/master/util/InstanceNormalization.lua

My opinion is wrong. see below.

https://github.com/junyanz/CycleGAN/blob/master/util/InstanceNormalization.lua
My opinion is wrong. see below.
body:
The implementation in https://github.com/farizrahman4u/keras-contrib is not exactly right.
According to the paper, the IN layer should perform differently in training/testing phase.
There needs a running_mean and a running_var.
The right Torch implementation for reference is here:
https://github.com/junyanz/CycleGAN/blob/master/util/InstanceNormalization.lua

*My opinion is wrong. see below.*
